org.apache.polygene.api.service

Interface ServiceActivation

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AbstractPolygeneMetricsTest.Commands, CassandraEntityStoreService, CodahaleMetricsProvider, EhCachePoolService, ElasticSearchSupport, ESClientIndexQueryService, ESClusterIndexQueryService, ESFilesystemIndexQueryService, GeodeEntityStoreService, HazelcastEntityStoreService, IniSecurityManagerService, JCloudsEntityStoreService, LevelDBEntityStoreService, MemcachePoolService, MemoryCachePoolService, MongoDBEntityStoreService, PasswordRealmService, PreferencesEntityStoreService, RedisEntityStoreService, RiakEntityStoreService, SQLEntityStoreService, UoWFileFactory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractElasticSearchSupport, AbstractPolygeneMetricsTest.CommandsMixin, CassandraEntityStoreMixin, CodahaleMetricsMixin, EhCachePoolMixin, ESClientSupport, ESClusterSupport, ESFilesystemSupport, GeodeEntityStoreMixin, HazelcastEntityStoreMixin, IniSecurityManagerService.Mixin, JCloudsEntityStoreMixin, LevelDBEntityStoreMixin, MemcachePoolMixin, MemoryCachePoolMixin, MongoDBEntityStoreMixin, PasswordRealmMixin, PreferencesEntityStoreMixin, RedisEntityStoreMixin, RiakEntityStoreMixin, SQLEntityStoreMixin, UoWFileFactory.Mixin

    @Activators(value=ServiceActivation.ServiceActivator.class)
public interface ServiceActivation
    Convenience interface for simple Service Activation. Let your ServiceComposite extends ServiceActivation and implement it in one of its Mixins. A corresponding Activator is automatically registered.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  ServiceActivation.ServiceActivator
      Service Activator.
